8001.name: Snowball
8001.effect: Throw a snowball at the target.

8002.name: Ice Shard
8002.effect: Hurl a shard of ice at the target.

8003.name: Ice Punch
8003.effect: Punch the opponent with an icy first. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

8004.name: Frost Fang
8004.effect: Bite the opponent with frosty fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat and 10% chance to freeze the target.

8005.name: Icicle Spear
8005.effect: Launch sharp icicles at the target, hitting 2-5 times.

8006.name: Glacial Spike
8006.effect: Strike the target with a giant icicle. This move has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

8007.name: Subzero Slam
8007.effect: A high-impact slam infused with freezing energy. This move has a 10% chance of paralysing the target and a 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed stat.

8008.name: Artic Impact
8008.effect: Charge at the opponent with immense force, shrouded in a chilling aura. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

8009.name: Icy Wind
8009.effect: Release a chilling wind that hits all opponents and lowers their Speed stat.

8010.name: Frost Breath
8010.effect: Exhale a chilling breath at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of freezing the target.

8011.name: Chill Blast
8011.effect: Rapidly cool the opponent, with a 10% chance of freezing the target. This move is super-effective against Water-typed target.

8012.name: Cold Snap
8012.effect: A sudden burst of freezing air that has a 10% chance of freezing the target and 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed stat.

8013.name: Cryo Beam
8013.effect: Shoot a beam of frosty ice at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

8014.name: Blizzard
8014.effect: Summon a massive blizzard to damage everyone on the field, allies and foes alike.

8015.name: Permafrost
8015.effect: Envope the opponent in permafrost. This move will harshly lower the target's Speed stat.

8016.name: Frost Nova
8016.effect: Unlease a burst of powerful freezing energy on the opponent. The user cannot move in the next turn.

8017.name: Hailstorm
8017.effect: Summon a hailstorm that damages all combatants for several turns.

8018.name: Frost Armour
8018.effect: Cover the user in a layer of ice. This move boosts the user's Defense stat.

8019.name: Snow Cloak
8019.effect: Envelop the user in a cloak of snow. This move boosts the user's Special Defense stat.

8020.name: Ice Wall
8020.effect: Raise a barrier of ice that protect the user and allies by reducing all Ice-typed attacks from opponents by 50%.
